title: Max The Curse of Brotherhood-RELOADED
description:

:::: Max The Curse of Brotherhood ::::


::Information::


nERv

Max: The Curse of Brotherhood (c) Microsoft Game Studios

05/2014 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Adventure

Max: The Curse of Brotherhood is a cinematic adventure filled with
action-packed platforming and creative puzzle-solving. Armed with only a
Magic Marker, Max must confront evil at every turn in a hostile and
fantastical world in order to save his kid brother, Felix. Join Max on his
great adventure

1. Burn or mount the image
2. Install the game.
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
4. Play the game
5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows XP SP3 or newer 
Processor: Dual-Core 1.6 ghz / AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.0ghz 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 3 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX(r) compatible
